page.title: 08Health
page.content: There is no doctor,dentist or local health authority hospital within the 12 km block.Generally anyone requiring medical attention must travel into Telford or Shrewsbury.A mobile clinic visits the villages once a month,mainly for pre-natal,anti-natal checks and immunisation.A District Nurse and Health visitors call to assist with general nursing care and to check on children under the age of 5.A private nursing home has been established at Kynnersley by converting the Old Rectory (Deansfield).The Trust Homes at Preston provide attended accomodation for 25 people at present,aged from 63 to 90,most are women living in single flats,though there are two flats for married couples.It costs Â£40 pm for a kitchen,living and bedroom,with cleaning help and meals on wheels.
